page.title: 05Turnditch Primary School
page.content: Our school was originally built in 1846.An Infant classroom was added in 1910 while a further extension in 1979 provided for indoor toilets and a new cloakroom and office.This year we have had a new playground added. This is a great improvement. Nearly all of the children live within two miles of the school. Almost all of the children are brought to our school by car. School starts at nine'o clock and finishes at three thirty for the Juniors. The Infants go home at three'o clock. All children stay for school dinner. The meals are cooked at school by Mrs.Morley. Each meal costs us 45p. We have lots of visits from this school.In your last year here, you go on an extended visit.Over recent years they have been to Norfolk, Suffolk, Northumberland,Wales and on the canal.
